document_data.name: Serpent's Tail Stream
document_data.mainbody: The '''Serpent's Tail Stream''' was a river that wound through the realm of [[Najara]] in the [[Western Heartlands]].
document_data.Description: The banks of the stream were lined with gravel, and were prone to regular flooding.

Geography.Flora & Fauna: As befitting its name, the Serpent's Tail was home to a variety of reptiles, including [[crocodile#Sub-Species|black caiman crocodiles]] and different species of aquatic [[snake]]s. Schools of [[salmon]] and [[trout|horned trout]] were found and regularly fished from within the river.

document_data.History: A great battle between the [[Swift Cavarly]] of [[Evermeet]] and the [[phaerimm]]-controlled army of [[bugbear]]s and [[mind flayer]]s was fought along the banks of the Serpent's Tail in the {{YearlinkName|1371}}. Many elven corpses remained along the stream following the battle due to the foolishness of Commander [[Laerm Ryence]].
document_data.Notable Locations: The entrance to an ancient [[Anauria]]n crypt within the water became accessible when the Serpent's Tail experienced significant flooding.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Ophidian]] fishers were commonly found along the banks of the Serpent's Tail.
